sentences.english: Let us die young, or let us live forever.
sentences.chinese: 就讓我們在年輕的時候死去，或者，讓我們永世長存。

sentences.english: Real love will stick together ever and forever.
sentences.chinese: 真正的愛，粘在一起，永生永世分不開。

sentences.english: You are a heir of Eternity.
We acquire silicon from the rocks which have been lying all over the hills and mountains for aeons.
sentences.chinese: 我們從爲永世在整個山丘和山一直在躺的岩石獲得硅。

sentences.english: I will cherish my visit here in memory when I live.
sentences.chinese: 我將會永生永世珍惜我探望此地留下的回想。

sentences.english: Seeing the eggs hatch out for the first time is a moment that I will never forget.
sentences.chinese: 第一次看到蛋孵化的那一刻令我永世難忘。

sentences.english: It has left permanent pity for all Beijing citizens and all Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 這關於北京市和全國人平易近都留下了永世的遺憾。

sentences.english: When true love is found between the couple, it will last eternally.
sentences.chinese: 真正的愛，黏在一起後，是永生永世都分不開的。

sentences.english: But the art of his lyrics will endure.
sentences.chinese: 但他的抒情詩藝術將永世長存。

sentences.english: Forgive me for wanting to be with you when I grow old
sentences.chinese: 原諒我希望永生永世和你在一起。

sentences.english: That was their first talk, so cherish that Luoluo would never forget.
sentences.chinese: 那是第一次的交談，珍貴地讓落落永世難忘。

sentences.english: And you always fear what you don't understand.
sentences.chinese: 並且你將永世懼怕你所不睬解的東西。

sentences.english: We can spur grelocated on deeds thlocated on history will mark declistinges effectively as centuries from now.
sentences.chinese: 我們能鞭策將會被歷史永世銘刻的壯偉的事業。

sentences.english: Long will the legend be told, and forever will his name be remembered.
sentences.chinese: 傳說會被永世傳誦，他的名字也會永遠被銘記。

sentences.english: We all join wishing you very happy birthday and many years' health prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 人們大家共祝您華誕快樂，永世健康，前程似錦。

sentences.english: The paper said editorially that the olympic spirit is transcedent.
sentences.chinese: 這家報紙的社論說，奧林匹克精神是永世長存的。

definition: to live forever/eternal life/all one's life
a whole lifetime (idiom); all my life
Ceaseless pain (Sanskrit: Avici), one of the Buddhist hells/fig. hell/hell on earth
to die/future incarnation/next life/to be born/to come into the world/future generation
generation/period of 30 years/one's whole lifetime/lifelong/age/era/times/the whole world/the First (of numbered European kings)
